name: Vampirism
description: You are afflicted with vampirism and suffer the benefits and weaknesses of the undead curse.

options.name: Vampire
options.description: You are no longer a humanoid and cannot be affected by spells that target them - instead, your new creature type is undead. You are undying, but require blood to function. You must consume at least one vial of blood per day, or you enter a stasis after completing a full rest which cannot be ended until someone feeds you the required blood. When you are killed, you also enter this stasis. If you are pierced through the heart with a wooden stake while in this stasis, you turn to ash and are killed.

options.name: Action : Transformation
options.description: You transform into a beast based on your bloodline that is of the minion tier. If the beast form reaches 0 health, you transform back into your original form and cannot use the ability until you complete a full rest or consume blood.

options.name: Vampire Curse
options.description: All vampires suffer from a debilitating curse:

subchoices.name: Blood Weakness
subchoices.description: You cannot benefit from food, drink, or consumables of any kind and cannot restore health in any way except for blood. When you drink a vial of blood, or successfully deal damage with the Bite action, you gain 1d4 health.

subchoices.name: Silver Bane
subchoices.description: When you take any damage from a weapon or piece of ammunition with the silvered property while at 0 health, you must roll on the lifeline table. If you roll a '1', you do not get to make a death check and instead turn to ash. Additionally, carrying or touching an object that contains silver deals 1 true damage to you each round.

subchoices.name: Holy Weakness
subchoices.description: You are especially weak against divine magic. Any damage that bypasses your mitigation is doubled against you and causes you to become afraid.

options.name: Action : Vampiric Bite
options.description: You make a brawling attack against a creature, dealing 3 physical damage for each dice that hit. If the target is a humanoid and take damage after mitigation, they must make a resilience of check of 5 after their next full rest, or they become infected with vampirism. Each full rest, they can make this check again to clear the infection. If the target dies while infected, they must make a final resilience check; on a 9 or lower, they rise as a mindless vampire spawn, otherwise, they gain the vampirism trait. If this action is used against a willing or unconscious target, the attack roll is not necessary and the bite deals 3 true damage.

options.name: Vampire Bloodline
options.description: There are various vampire bloodlines, each with unique abilities and transformation forms:

subchoices.name: Strigoi Bloodline
subchoices.description: Strigoi are feral, grave-born predators, embodying the hunger and savagery of the oldest vampire myths. Your Transform action allows you to turn into a wolf. Your might and senses skills are upgraded and you gain +1 physical mitigation. When you start your turn in direct sunlight, you are considered blinded.

subchoices.name: Nosferatu Bloodline
subchoices.description: Nosferatu are twisted, plague-bearing outcasts, rulers of vermin and corruption in the shadows of civilization. Your Transform action allows you to turn into a snake. Your stealth and wildcraft skills are upgraded and you gain +3 toxic mitigation. If you start your turn in direct sunlight, you take 1 true damage.

subchoices.name: Moroi Bloodline
subchoices.description: Moroi are liminal half-breeds, cursed with vampiric power yet gifted with eerie sorcery and prophetic insight. Your Transform action allows you to turn into an owl. Your Bite action cannot spread vampirism and you are considered a humanoid instead of undead. You are also blessed with unnatural magical ability, gaining +1 skill with dark magic. Unlike other lineages, you are not affected by sunlight.

subchoices.name: Dracul Bloodline
subchoices.description: Dracul are regal warlords and aristocrats of the night, embodying command, charisma, and the dark majesty of the vampire lord. Your Transform action allows you to turn into a bat. Your persuasion and logic skills are upgraded and you gain +3 psychic mitigation. If you start your turn in direct sunlight, you take 1 true damage.
